messages.subject: Re: E-loop was Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] institutionalization of children
messages.msgSnippet: Buzz, I guess you already gathered this, but I want in. Please let me know when it s up and running. Also, thanks so much for your support today. It can make a
messages.messageBody:
Buzz,
I guess you already gathered this, but I want in. Please let me know when
it's up and running. Also, thanks so much for your support today. It can
make a difference.
Amy
----- Original Message -----
From: D Klement <klement@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 26, 2000 2:09 PM
Subject: E-loop was Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] institutionalization of
children


> Debra Caruso wrote:
> >
> > HI Amy :) I am always having to explain to people why,sometimes I can't
> > go here,or do this or that.I get tired so easily,I have trouble getting
> > to sleep at night.I know there are lots women who are dealing with
> > things like this ,deb :)
>
> Ok, so if nobody has any objections .... those who want on the loop
> e-mail me and I'll also inform the people on the Canadian hs e-list and
> see if any of them are interested.
> I don't expect it to be a terribly active group and there could be weeks
> where every thing is going fine for most of us but it will a sounding
> board, a bitching/venting arena and a place of comfort when we need it.
>
> Nothing will be off topic because everything colours our lives and
> affects us and the homeschooling/unschooling of our children.
>
> Buzz ... my hair aint as short as it was when I adopted that moniker but
> boy oh boy my leg muscles are buzzing enough to make up for it.
> --
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The Klement Family "Education is what survives when
> Darryl, Debbie, what has been learned has been
> Kathleen, Nathan & forgotten"
> Samantha B.F. Skinner in "New Scientist".
> e-mail- klement@...
> Canadian homeschool page: http:\\www.flora.org/homeschool-ca/
> Ont. Federation of Teaching Parents: http:\\www.flora.org/oftp/
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Was the salesman clueless? Productopia has the answers.
> http://click.egroups.com/1/4633/14/_/448294/_/962053606/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
> Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com
>
> To Unsubscribe: mailto:Unschooling-dotcom-unsubscribe@onelist.com
>
>

messages.subject: E-loop was Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] institutionalization of children
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ok, so if nobody has any objections .... those who want on the loop e-mail me and I ll also inform the people on the Canadian hs e-list and see if any of
messages.messageBody:
Debra Caruso wrote:
>
> HI Amy :) I am always having to explain to people why,sometimes I can't
> go here,or do this or that.I get tired so easily,I have trouble getting
> to sleep at night.I know there are lots women who are dealing with
> things like this ,deb :)

Ok, so if nobody has any objections .... those who want on the loop
e-mail me and I'll also inform the people on the Canadian hs e-list and
see if any of them are interested.
I don't expect it to be a terribly active group and there could be weeks
where every thing is going fine for most of us but it will a sounding
board, a bitching/venting arena and a place of comfort when we need it.

Nothing will be off topic because everything colours our lives and
affects us and the homeschooling/unschooling of our children.

Buzz ... my hair aint as short as it was when I adopted that moniker but
boy oh boy my leg muscles are buzzing enough to make up for it.
--
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Klement Family "Education is what survives when
Darryl, Debbie, what has been learned has been
Kathleen, Nathan & forgotten"
Samantha B.F. Skinner in "New Scientist".
e-mail- klement@...
Canadian homeschool page: http:\\www.flora.org/homeschool-ca/
Ont. Federation of Teaching Parents: http:\\www.flora.org/oftp/
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
